title: I got charged twice for one skin
body:
Im actually so sad it charged me twice for a "My Shop " Blood Moon Talon skin and i want my RP back it even says in the Purchase screen that i apparently bough it twice 
I have reported it to Riot but the response is so slow{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Hey, what's your ticket number?  I'm happy to check on the status for you!
